info_god.ability: (Once per game) Remove one Seal and obtain one Energy per player on Mukaki's side.
info_god.passive: When a player on Makari-Hari's side uses a spell card, draw one additional Card.

info_devil.ability: Entangled in binding lies, Makari-Hari cannot use any abilities.

info_god.ability: Engulfed in holy light, Mukaki cannot use any abilities.

info_devil.ability: (Once per game) Add one seal, and every player must discard one Card for each player on their side.
info_devil.passive: Players on Mukaki's side can play as many Cards as they wish during a Trial.

info_god.ability: Choose one player on Mukaki's side to lose two Energy. (Unless they have zero Energy remaining)

info_devil.ability: Choose one player on Makari-Hari's side to lose two Energy. (Unless they have zero Energy remaining)

info_god.ability: Every player on Makari-Hari's side draws one Card to their hand.

info_devil.ability: Every player on Mukaki's side draws one Card to their hand.

info_god.ability: Each player on Mukaki's side discards two Cards from their hand.

info_devil.ability: Each player on Makari-Hari's side discards two Cards from their hand.

info_god.ability: Your side discards their entire hand and participate in turn. Pull two Cards from the deck to your hand. Keep pulling pairs of Cards as long as the Element match, else discard and stop.

info_devil.ability: Your side discards their entire hand and participate in turn. Pull two Cards from the deck to your hand. Keep pulling pairs of Cards as long as the Element match, else discard and stop.

info_god.passive: When the Trial begins, players on the opposing side must reveal their hand to Makari-Hari's side.

info_devil.passive: When the Trial begins, players on the opposing side must reveal their hand to Mukaki's side.

info_god.ability: Pick two players. Those players must then swap hands.

info_devil.ability: Pick two players. Those players must then swap hands.

info_god.passive: Makari-Hari's side draws their Cards last. The Consul draws three Cards. They keep one to pick and return the other two Cards to the top of the deck in any order.

info_devil.passive: Mukaki's side draws their Cards last. The Consul draws three Cards. They keep one to pick and return the other two Cards to the top of the deck in any order.

info_god.ability: Pick an element, all players on Mukaki's side must discard all matching Cards from their hand.

info_devil.ability: Pick an element, all players on Mukaki's side must discard all matching Cards from their hand.

info_god.ability: Everyone on Makari-Hari's side draws one card, then preforms two trials only Makari-Hari's side  participate in.

info_devil.ability: Everyone on Mukaki's side draws one card, then preforms two trials only Mukaki's side participate in.

info_god.ability: Take all Energy from the Hero on Mukaki's side with the most Energy. (If a tie, pick one) Distribute this Energy to players as desired.

info_devil.ability: Take all Energy from the Hero on Makari-Hari's side with the most Energy. (If a tie, pick one) Distribute this Energy to players as desired.

info_god.ability: For every hero on Mukaki's side with no energy, turn them to your side.

info_devil.ability: For every hero on Makari-Hari's side with no energy, turn them to your side.

info_god.ability: Each player on Mukaki's side must submit one Card from their hand to your side. These cards are distributed to your side as Energy.

info_devil.ability: Each player on Makari-Hari's side must submit one Card from their hand to your side. These cards are distributed to your side as Energy.

info_god.passive: When a player on Makari-Hari's side draws a spell card, show that Card everyone, the draw one additional Card (Once per round).

info_devil.passive: When a player on Mukaki's side draws a spell card, show that Card everyone, the draw one additional Card (Once per round).

info_god.ability: Each side can wager their Energy. The side with the largest wager draws two Cards per Energy wagered. All energy offered is discarded. If tied no side wins. This ability resolves at the end of the Hero Stage

info_devil.ability: Each side can wager their Energy. The side with the largest wager draws two Cards per Energy wagered. All energy offered is discarded. If tied no side wins. This ability resolves at the end of the Hero Stage

info_god.passive: The cost to preform an Exchange is reduced to two Cards for players on Makari-Hari's side

info_devil.passive: The cost to preform an Exchange is reduced to two Cards for players on Mukaki's side

info_god.ability: Pick an Element, then a player. All matching Cards in their hand is converted into Energy.

info_devil.ability: Pick an Element, then a player. All matching Cards in their hand is converted into Energy.
